step_feedback.feedback: Good job initiating the movement by squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Try to keep your elbows and wrists a bit more stable during this phase.
You're doing well with the circular motion. Focus on keeping your right elbow and wrist more aligned with your shoulder as you roll.
Excellent completion of the repetitions! For the next set, try to maintain a smoother, more controlled circular motion, especially with your wrists.

exercise_summary: You're doing great with your shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Try to keep your elbows and wrists steady as you move.
